name: Pink Onion
author: Dan B.
description:
boss: "here are ya names..."

Mr. Brown Onion
Mr. White Onion
Mr. Blond Onion
Mr. Blue Onion
Mr. Orange Onion
Mr. Pink Onion

pink onion: "why am i mr pink?"

boss: "because you're a foody alright?!"

pink onion: "mr pink sounds like mr pizza..."

- Onionvoir Dogs, 1992

always thought i'd get the NES Mike Tyson's Punch Out!! bc mzafzn mike tyson; instead ended up ordering large PALERMO to try sopressata. overall ok, kinda thin kinda wet. #twss

i destro'd the large in a few minutes; kinda wish there was xl or maybe get 2 pizzas next time.
